title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Feb 28 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Feb 28 2022
description:
Where's Fauci? What a coincidence! The science changed just in time for Biden's State of the Union (which Clay and Buck note will be a "dumpster fire"), NY unimpressive Gov drops mask mandate. We can't let Democrat mask nonsense go unpunished in November: Give even "remotely connected" Democrats "an ass-kicking," says Clay. Biden: Psychological impact of covid is preventing people from realizing how great the economy is. Buck says people will need long-term therapy for mask brainwashing. CBS, Schumer continue to lie about Trump's interview with us, pretend he praised Putin's invasion of Ukraine by taking sarcastic comment out of context. C&B both heard and saw while at Mar-a-Lago the way Trump really said it. Hillary lies about our interview, says Trump is giving "aid and comfort" to Putin. All of the foreign policy issues Trump was right about. C&B take a call from a fired-up caller from the free state of Florida. Buck notes he spread the truth and wisdom of C&B show at CPAC.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
